z2, zz9: keep going, we've got to move forward!
z3, zz8: we've no choice, we must retreat!
z4, zz7, killthearchers: we've got to kill those archers!
z5, zz6: don't let those mongrels reach the villagers!
the Masons are coming from the hills! Protect the villagers!
hold the village! Defend the peasants!
defend the innocent! For Agatha and her people!
the Masons mean to take the village! Defend it!
don't let them reach our gates with that ram!
don't let the ram reach our gate!
stop that battering ram!
kill them, they're pushing the ram!
forward! Take out the battering ram!
they mean to batter our gates! Take out the battering ram!
kill the ones pushing the ram!
defend the king!
the king must not fall!
push them back! Don't let them reach the king!
hold the throne room! They're trying to kill the king!
rally to the king! Rally to the king!
keep those dirty mongrels out!
keep them away from the valley!
they mean some foul deep! Keep them away!
stop the Masons from getting any closer!
don't let the Order any closer, they must be stopped!
defend the cistern! Don't let the Masons befoul our waters
stop the cart from entering the aquifer!
they mean to poison our people! Keep the cart away from our waters!
don't let them bring that foul cart into the cistern!
do not let that vile disease into the aquifer!
defend both sluice gate cranks! Hold back the waters!
keep the sluice gate closed! Defend the two cranks!
no! Don't let them release the befouled water! Protect both cranks!
keep the Masons away from the sluice gate cranks!
stop the Masons from releasing that foul water! Protect both sluice gate cranks!
defend the high born at all costs! They mean to murder them!
protect the royal family with your lives!
they know we guard the king's court! Protect them!
they keep coming! Defend the high-born at all costs!
hold fast and defend the royal family!
turn the ballistas on their own barricade!
we're blocked at that barricade! Use the ballistas to tear it down!
we cannot progress until we take that wall down! Use the ballistas!
we must capture their ballistas and use them to penetrate the barricade!
free the slaves and stop their forges!
the slaves! Break their chains!
we can't leave the slaves to this fate! Free them!
we must free our people from these shackels!
free our peasant folk from their bondage!
raid the citadel and kill the false king!
kill Malric the traitor!
we aren't finished here until the usurper's head is on a pike!
we've almost finished this rebellion! Kill Malric!
to the citadel! Repay the lord of traitors with **death!**
our ships are waiting for a signal! Light the fire!
we need our ships to blow that wall! Signal them with fire!
grab torches and get that signal fire burning!
find torches, light the fires! Our ships lie in wait!
our ships are in danger! Take out those trebuchets!
the enemy trebuchets need to be taken out, **now**!
don't let them sink our ships! Destroy their siege weapons!
their trebuchets are destroying our navy! Tear them down!
destroy their trebuchets! Our ships are sitting ducks out there!
we need to support our ships! Take over the enemy ballistas!
get up on the wall and use their ballistas against them!
we need to take out the enemy ships! Use the ballistas!
use the ballistas to help turn the tide of the sea battle!
there! On their wall! Haha! We'll use their own ballistas against them!
burn the farm! Burn it all!
grab torches! Set fire to the farm!
find a torch! Burn the farm down!
torch the farm!
destory the farm with fire!
push that cart up to the gate!
get to the cart! Bring it to their walls!
keep that cart moving! We must reach the wall!
don't let them stop the cart! Keep it moving!
take the cart to their walls!
go and bring back the Mason banner!
disgrace the Masons by capturing their banner!
capture the banner of those treasonous Masons!
capture the banner of those order of traitors!
bring back that black and red banner of treachery!
hurry! We must bring back our banner!
the traitors have taken our banner! Stop them!
the Masons have our colors! Bring back our banner!
free our banner from those cretinous Masons!
z6, zz5: if you can't hold your ground, who will?
if you don't hold your ground, we're finished!
you've got to hold your ground!
you've got to hold your ground!
z8, zz3: oh my god, there's more of them incoming!
z9, zz2: in case you haven't noticed, they're right behind me!
they're behind us, they're behind us!
they've gotten behind us, they've gotten behind us!
x4, xx7: go ahead! I've got your back!
don't worry, I've got your back!
x5, xx6, thank: you've done me a great kindness!
if we get out of this, your drink's on me!
I would have been lost without you!
he nearly had me, thank you!
if we get out of this, your drinks are on me!
if you ever need a favor, I am your man!
x7, xx4: well, it wasn't exactly on purpose!
I'm so sorry, I don't know what came over me!
I don't know what came over me!
x8, xx3, taunt: well aren't you a cute one? Better not turn my back on you!
oh my, aren't you handsome? Best not turn my back on you!
if you're trying to kill me, you're going the wrong way!
if you're trying to fight me, you're going the wrong way!
if you throw enough of them, maybe one of them will actually hit me!
you sure got a lot of armor on!
that's a pretty big sword! Are you compensating for something?
don't look at me like that... it's creepy!
you fight well, I shall name a daughter after you!
come here and fight me like a man!
well aren't you handsome? Would you care for a dance?
x0, xx1, respect: you fought well, it'd be a shame to kill you.
you fought well, I shall name my first born in your memory, ha-ha!
you're a skilled fighter, but you're on the wrong side.
I see you're no stranger to the blade.
you fight well, it's a shame you choose the wrong side.
this has been fun, it's time to end it.
